Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.linearithmic

package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.linearithmic
  • Class
    Description
    IntroSort<X extends Comparable<X>>
    A class that implements the Introsort algorithm, a hybrid sorting algorithm that begins with quicksort and switches to heapsort when the recursion depth exceeds a predetermined threshold or insertion sort when the sub-array size becomes small.
    MergeSort<X extends Comparable<X>>
    A generic implementation of the MergeSort algorithm for sorting elements of type X, where X extends Comparable.
    MergeSortBasic<X extends Comparable<X>>
    MergeSortBasic is a simple implementation of the Merge Sort algorithm, designed to work with elements that implement the Comparable interface.
    MergeSortDecisionTree
    MergeSortDecisionTree is a class that implements the Merge Sort algorithm.
    Partition<X extends Comparable<X>>
    Class to represent a partition for Quicksort.
    Partitioner<X extends Comparable<X>>
    The Partitioner interface defines the contract for different partitioning strategies that can be used during the sorting process, such as in Quicksort implementations.
    QuickSort<X extends Comparable<X>>
    Abstract class representing the QuickSort algorithm, which is a recursive sorting algorithm using partitioning.
    QuickSort_3way<X extends Comparable<X>>
    QuickSort_3way is an implementation of QuickSort algorithm using the three-way partitioning strategy.
    QuickSort_Basic<X extends Comparable<X>>
    Implementation of the QuickSort algorithm with a basic partitioning strategy.
    QuickSort_Basic.Partitioner_Basic<Y extends Comparable<Y>>
    A basic implementation of the Partitioner interface that partitions an array into smaller subarrays for sorting.
    QuickSort_DualPivot<X extends Comparable<X>>
    Class QuickSort_DualPivot which extends QuickSort.
    QuickSort_Exp<X extends Comparable<X>>
    A specialized implementation of the QuickSort algorithm with experimental partitioning.
    TimSort<X extends Comparable<X>>
    Sorter which delegates to Timsort via Arrays.sort.
